stimulusHtml: Planet X has a mass M, radius R, and no atmosphere. An object of mass m is located a distance 2R above the surface of planet X, as shown in the figure above. The object is released from rest and falls to the surface of the planet. What is the speed of the object just before it reaches the surface of planet X?
